eng.postCodeHelp-expl: Below is the list of properties available in the Post Mustache Template - property: value. You want to use properties to populate Mustache template. Remember to place the property you want to use in double curly braces (e.g.: {{post_title}}).
eng.postCodeHelp-excerpt: post_excerpt: this is part of the article
eng.postCodeHelp-post_content: post_content: This is the content of the post
eng.postCodeHelp-guid: guid: http://localhost/websites/wordpress_test/wordpress/?p=165 - (that is the link to the article)
eng.closinginformation: Your Newsletter page should be available now:
